title: BLACK SCREEN "Invalid format" after champion select
body:
i never had this problem,having a black screen after champ select...i listed through old threads did thing that many did and for them it worked but for me it doesnt , my resolution is 1280x1024,tried entering config file and adjusting my resolution,which i did and it still doesnt work !!
Any help ? Please and thank you {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
After champion select, the game needs to bridge a new connection to our game servers. If you're seeing a black champion loading screen, there's a good chance that your network's connection became interrupted for one reason or another. 

Go through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up that connection. Let me know how it works!
